item.title: Creative destruction is the industrial and societal evolution that has driven human progress forward since a distant ancestor smashed two rocks together and created a spark. In the age of exponentially advancing technology and major social changes, creative destruction is set to be the new normal. We are at the very beginning of the next Cambrian explosion; Fortune 500 companies and the closed minded individuals wont survive it. But if you're reading this, you just might make it ;).

item.title: No title
item.description: "The urge to destroy is also a creative urge"
